author: @sriramraghu9308
text: As a human resources professional, to add a little bit of points ; we are  Hiring employees with  experience and sophisticated tech  stack understanding, problem solving and good solution building skills.  The main issue with freshers is that they are skilled but unstable owing  to repeat job hopping and are  unwilling to increase their working  hours.   Finally, in the previous six months,  we have seen an increase in the number of professionals enrolling with  forged experience certificates and  documents.   However, individuals are hired and  continue to be hired.   All of this will be resolved in India by the end of the fiscal year 2023 (April).

author: @Virtualexist
text: Underperforming people are always at risk, even without layoffs, but the thing about recession is it does not see the skill set. Eg: Twitter laid off 50% stafff, so did they hire 50% incompetent or underperforming people? Or 11000 in Meta were below average enough to be fired? It is weird to see pointless motivation. Skillset skill set skillset, people will become robots if they take every breath considering skillset and moulding their life just for a job. I am someone happily opening a bakery and earning 20% of so called job where you are always at stress of gettting fired or whatever. I have only 1 life. And I want to live it with clarity. Not dying rolled up in a pivot table of spreadsheet. I need meaningful work, not meaningless way to print money.

author: @saptarshisanyal6738
text: IT is a cruel industry. It expects you to keep learning at every stage of your life. Now, learning is good, but as the age increases, it becomes very difficult to learn new techs and keep it in mind for a longer period. This coupled with the fact that you also have big pressure of family at this stage of life.  How long a person will take this huge pressure? Ultimately sugar, pressure, heart disease will come.  Crux is, if you are in IT, save as much as possible and look to have your own small business at your parental home location after 15-20 years of experience, because in any case, it is very difficult to survive in IT after 45 years of age, irrespective of recession.
